steps.code: <?php require_once '/wordpress/wp-load.php'; $books = array( array( 'title' => 'The Great Gatsby', 'content' => 'A story of wealth, love, and the American Dream in the Jazz Age.', 'isbn' => '978-0743273565', 'author_name' => 'F. Scott Fitzgerald', 'published_year' => 1925, 'genre' => 'Classic Fiction', 'page_count' => 180, 'in_print' => true ), array( 'title' => 'To Kill a Mockingbird', 'content' => 'A profound novel about racial injustice and moral growth in the American South.', 'isbn' => '978-0061120084', 'author_name' => 'Harper Lee', 'published_year' => 1960, 'genre' => 'Classic Fiction', 'page_count' => 281, 'in_print' => true ), array( 'title' => '1984', 'content' => 'A dystopian masterpiece about totalitarianism and surveillance.', 'isbn' => '978-0451524935', 'author_name' => 'George Orwell', 'published_year' => 1949, 'genre' => 'Dystopian Fiction', 'page_count' => 328, 'in_print' => true ), array( 'title' => 'Pride and Prejudice', 'content' => 'A witty romance exploring themes of love, reputation, and class.', 'isbn' => '978-0141439518', 'author_name' => 'Jane Austen', 'published_year' => 1813, 'genre' => 'Romance', 'page_count' => 279, 'in_print' => true ), array( 'title' => 'The Catcher in the Rye', 'content' => 'A coming-of-age story following Holden Caulfield through New York City.', 'isbn' => '978-0316769488', 'author_name' => 'J.D. Salinger', 'published_year' => 1951, 'genre' => 'Coming-of-age Fiction', 'page_count' => 234, 'in_print' => true ) ); foreach ( $books as $book ) { $post_id = wp_insert_post( array( 'post_title' => $book['title'], 'post_content' => $book['content'], 'post_status' => 'publish', 'post_type' => 'book' ) ); if ( $post_id ) { update_post_meta( $post_id, 'isbn', $book['isbn'] ); update_post_meta( $post_id, 'author_name', $book['author_name'] ); update_post_meta( $post_id, 'published_year', $book['published_year'] ); update_post_meta( $post_id, 'genre', $book['genre'] ); update_post_meta( $post_id, 'page_count', $book['page_count'] ); update_post_meta( $post_id, 'in_print', $book['in_print'] ); } } echo 'Created ' . count( $books ) . ' sample books.'; ?>
